content: उत्साहः [उद्-सह्-घञ्] {@--1@} Effort, exertion; धृत्युत्साहसमन्वितः <ls>Bg. 18. 26.</ls> {@--2@} Energy, inclination, desire; मंदोत्साहः कृतोस्मि मृगयापवादिना माठव्येन <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; ममोत्साहभंगं मा कृथाः <ls>H. 3</ls> do not damp my energy. {@--3@} Perseverance, strenuous effort, energy, one of the three Śaktis or powers of a ruler (the other two being मंत्र and प्रभाव); नीताविवोत्साहगुणेन संपद् <ls>Ku. 1. 22.</ls> {@--4@} Determination, resolution; हसितेन भाविमरणोत्साहस्तया सूचितः <ls>Amaru. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Power, ability; <ls>Ms. 5. 86.</ls> {@--6@} Firmness, fortitude, strength. {@--7@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Firmness or fortitude regarded as the feeling which gives rise to the वीर or heroic sentiment; कार्यारंभेषु संरंभः स्थेयानुत्साह उच्यते <ls>S. D. 3</ls>; परपराक्रमदानादिस्मृतिजन्मा औन्नत्याख्य उत्साहः <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--8@} Happiness. {@--9@} A thread.
